title: 'Size mismatch'
body: 'Size mentioned in the chart is not matching and is non-returnable waste of money'

title: 'Overpriced'
body: It's a good product, the fabric is thick and comfortable, pure cotton, good quality stitching as well.

title: 'Product got shrinked after one wash'
body: 'The quality of the product is good but after one wash it shrinkened too much. For example if you buy XL size after one wash it will be come L size. So better to buy the larger size. Thank you..'

title: 'Tooooo Small'
body: Lost my money by purchasing this product.. Don't purchase at all

title: 'No exchange or return'
body: Buy wisely They don't provide return or even exchange. Quality is just okay not good. And colour is not white ( this they have already mentioned)

title: 'Wrongly described and poor quality'
body: 'Pathetic material and as per the image given and description it was supposed to be receiving full sleeves lab coat but this is half sleeves...Very bad from Amazonshowing something else and delivering something else Disappointed'

title: 'Good Product.'
body: 'Everything is fine but the sleeves are not that long. Rest all good.'

title: 'Want to return the item due to small size than ordered.'
body: I have received the product of smaller size. It is totally different from the size mentioned in size chart & I want to return it. They don't even have a return or replacement policy.

title: 'Not satisfied'
body: 'Very poor kind of apron. Its just like a cotton shirt with apron shape and size'

title: 'Perfect...'
body: 'Good product.. And thanx to delivered tamely'

title: 'Fully satisfied with this product'
body: 'Awesome product. Good stuff and I love this'

title: 'Very good product with a speedy delivery'
body: 'Very good quality pure cotton apron/lab coat. Fitting is correct and stitching and finishing is also good.. Overall a very good product. Super fast delivery by amazon within 48hrs.'

title: 'Five Stars'
body: 'Nice fabric and pure cotton ! good for chemistry lab !'
